::ShadowWing::

  A stasis pod lands in the middle of a clearing in the forest.  It opens 
and a large bird emerges from it and takes flight.  She flies around 
surveing the landscape.  The sunlight shown throught her light gray wings.  
She loved to fly and forget the pain of her voyage.  She looked around for 
another pod that may have dropped to the planet.
  But she found none. She was worried.  Her brother's stasis pod had not 
fallen to the ground.  He was either still in orbit or the pod was 
obliterated.  She shook her head to clear her mind of these thoughts.  He's 
alive, she thought, he has to be.
  She then turned her thoughts to her surroundings.  The skies were blue and 
the air had the slight smell of lazar blast and burnt metal.  She heard some 
noices coming from a clearing just over a mountain ridge.  She flew over to 
see three groups of bots fighting over a ship.  She swooped down for a 
closer look.  She perched on a branch over the battle field.  She watched 
the fighting.  She focused her optics and used her high-power telescopic 
vision to see which bots were which.
   She saw that some bots had on the Maximal symbol and some had the 
Predacon symbol.  She watched and studied the battle.
